code: @Manual{,   title = {bbk: Client for Central Bank APIs},   author = {Maximilian Mücke},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.8.0.9000},   url = {https://m-muecke.github.io/bbk/}, }

title: Client for Central Bank APIs
text: bbk minimal R client following APIs: Banco de España (BdE) Bank Canada (BoC) Bank England (BoE) Banque de France (BdF) Deutsche Bundesbank (BBk) European Central Bank (ECB) Swiss National Bank (SNB) Österreichische Nationalbank (OeNB) future, may extended central banks financial institutions. Feel free open issue specific request.

title: Client for Central Bank APIs
text: can install released version bbk CRAN : development version GitHub :
code: install.packages("bbk") # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("m-muecke/bbk")

title: Client for Central Bank APIs
text: bbk functions prefixed according central bank access (bbk_, ecb_, snb_, boe_, bde_, bdf_, onb_, boc_) follow naming conventions respective APIs. typical workflow involves: Finding time series identifier relevant central bank’s website Using appropriate bbk function retrieve data
code: library(bbk)  # Deutsche Bundesbank - fetch 10 year daily yield curve yield_curve <- bbk_data(   flow = "BBSIS",   key = "D.I.ZAR.ZI.EUR.S1311.B.A604.R10XX.R.A.A._Z._Z.A",   start_period = "2020-01-01" )

title: Client for Central Bank APIs
text: SNBdata: R package downloading data Swiss National Bank (SNB). bundesbank: R scripts downloading time-series data Bundesbank. ecb: R interface European Central Bank’s Statistical Data Warehouse (SDW) API. oenb: R package accessing OeNB’s API. pdfetch: R package downloading economic financial time series public sources. readsdmx: R package reading SDMX data metadata. rsdmx: R package reading SDMX data metadata. tidyBdE: R package accessing Banco de España’s API. valet: R client Bank Canada Valet API.

what: bbk: Client for Central Bank APIs — bbk-package
title: bbk: Client for Central Bank APIs — bbk-package
text: client retrieving data metadata major central bank APIs. supports access 'Bundesbank SDMX Web Service API' (https://www.bundesbank.de/en/statistics/time-series-databases/help--sdmx-web-service/web-service-interface-data), 'Swiss National Bank Data Portal' (https://data.snb.ch/en), 'European Central Bank Data Portal API' (https://data.ecb.europa.eu/help/api/overview), 'Bank England Interactive Statistical Database' (https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/boeapps/database), 'Banco de España API' (https://www.bde.es/webbe/en/estadisticas/recursos/api-estadisticas-bde.html), 'Banque de France Web Service' (https://webstat.banque-france.fr/en/pages/guide-migration-api/), 'Bank Canada Valet API' (https://www.bankofcanada.ca/valet/docs).

title: bbk: Client for Central Bank APIs — bbk-package
text: Maintainer: Maximilian Mücke muecke.maximilian@gmail.com (ORCID)

title: Fetch Deutsche Bundesbank (BBk) data — bbk_data
code: bbk_data(   flow,   key = NULL,   start_period = NULL,   end_period = NULL,   first_n = NULL,   last_n = NULL )

title: Fetch Deutsche Bundesbank (BBk) data — bbk_data
text: https://www.bundesbank.de/en/statistics/time-series-databases/help--sdmx-web-service/web-service-interface-data

title: Fetch Deutsche Bundesbank (BBk) data — bbk_data
text: flow (character(1)) flow query, 5-8 characters. See bbk_metadata() available dataflows. key (character()) series keys query. start_period (NULL | character(1) | integer(1)) start date data. Supported formats: YYYY annual data (e.g., `2019“) YYYY-S[1-2] semi-annual data (e.g., "2019-S1") YYYY-Q[1-4] quarterly data (e.g., "2019-Q1") YYYY-MM monthly data (e.g., "2019-01") YYYY-W[01-53] weekly data (e.g., "2019-W01") YYYY-MM-DD daily business data (e.g., "2019-01-01") NULL, start date restriction applied (data retrieved earliest available date). Default NULL. end_period (NULL | character(1) | integer(1)) end date data, format start_period. NULL, end date restriction applied (data retrieved recent available date). Default NULL. first_n (NULL | numeric(1))  Number observations retrieve start series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL. last_n (NULL | numeric(1)) Number observations retrieve end series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL.

text: data.table::data.table() requested data.

title: Fetch European Central Bank (ECB) data — ecb_data
text: https://data.ecb.europa.eu/help/api/data

title: Fetch European Central Bank (ECB) data — ecb_data
text: flow (character(1)) Flow query. key (character()) series keys query. start_period (NULL | character(1) | integer(1)) Start date data. Supported formats: YYYY annual data (e.g., 2019) YYYY-S[1-2] semi-annual data (e.g., "2019-S1") YYYY-Q[1-4] quarterly data (e.g., "2019-Q1") YYYY-MM monthly data (e.g., "2019-01") YYYY-W[01-53] weekly data (e.g., "2019-W01") YYYY-MM-DD daily business data (e.g., "2019-01-01") NULL, start date restriction applied (data retrieved earliest available date). Default NULL. end_period (NULL | character(1) | integer(1)) End date data, format start_period. NULL, end date restriction applied (data retrieved recent available date). Default NULL. first_n (NULL | numeric(1)) Number observations retrieve start series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL. last_n (NULL | numeric(1)) Number observations retrieve end series. NULL, restriction applied. Default NULL.

what: Fetch Swiss National Bank (SNB) data — snb_data
title: Fetch Swiss National Bank (SNB) data — snb_data
text: Retrieve time series data SNB data portal.

title: Fetch Swiss National Bank (SNB) data — snb_data
code: snb_data(key, start_date = NULL, end_date = NULL, lang = "en")

title: Fetch Swiss National Bank (SNB) data — snb_data
text: https://data.snb.ch/en

title: Fetch Swiss National Bank (SNB) data — snb_data
text: key (character(1)) series key query. start_date (NULL | character(1) | Date(1)) Start date data. end_date (NULL | character(1) | Date(1)) End date data. lang (character(1)) Language query, either "en" "de". Default "en".

title: bbk 0.8.0
text: Add missing data bbk_series(). Support exchange rates Bank Canada (BoC). Support Bank Canada (BoC) data.

title: bbk 0.7.0
text: CRAN release: 2025-08-25 Switch checkmate input validation. Documentation improvements. Support Bank England (BoE) data. Support Banque de France (BdF) data. Support Banco de España (BdE) data. Support Österreichische Nationalbank (OeNB) data.

title: bbk 0.6.0
text: CRAN release: 2025-02-02 Migration data.table package. Internal data manipulation now done using data.table functions return data.table objects. Support Swiss National Bank (SNB) data.

title: bbk 0.5.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-12-02 New function ecb_euro_rates() get euro foreign exchange reference rates European Central Bank (ECB).

title: bbk 0.4.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-07-08 Support European Central Bank (ECB) data.

title: bbk 0.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-06-12 Prefix function name changed bb_ bbk_. Allow multiple keys bbk_data(). Dynamically parse column names bbk_data(). Support /data/flowRef endpoint.

title: bbk 0.2.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-04-30 Remove missing rows bb_series(). Better title unit parsing bb_series().

title: bbk 0.1.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-04-23 Initial CRAN submission.
